# removeItems(_:)

**Instance Method**

Removes the specified items from the web history.

## Declaration

```swift
func removeItems(_ items: [Any]!)
```

## Parameters

- **items**: An array of web history items to remove.

## Discussion

When successful, this method posts a notification ([doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WebHistoryItemsRemovedNotification]).

## Adding and Removing History Items

- **addItems(_:)**: Inserts or updates the specified items in the web history.
- **removeAllItems()**: Removes all items from the web history.
